price: Wapi! Bila ya shaka zilikujia Ishara zangu, nawe ukazikadhibisha, na ukajivuna, na ukawa miongoni mwa makafiri!
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: Utayapata wapi, ewe mwenye majuto! Mafunzo yangu yalikujia katika ndimi za Mitume, nawe ukayakanusha, na ukajiona bora, ukakataa kuyafuata, na ukawa katika dunia yako miongoni mwa wenye kushikilia ukafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: balā qad jāatka āyātī fakadhabta bihā wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kāfirīna
